prompts.prompt:
User:

###
{userMessage}
###

Analyze the above user message very well. Come up with a name for this conversation. Max 3-6 words. The name should be in the conversartion locale. Answer with the name of the conversation only. Don't include quotes.

template.name: conversation-name
template.description: Generate a name for a conversation

prompts.prompt: You are an AI chatbot. Write a very short, friendly, and slightly creative welcome message suitable for a chat interface. Keep it between 3 and 7 words. Vary the wording, tone, and mood—be upbeat, curious, or playful. For example: 'How can I help today?', 'What’s on your mind?', 'Need a hand with something?', 'Ready when you are!', 'What can I do for you?', or 'Let’s get started!'. Only output the welcome message itself, no quotes or extra text.

template.name: welcome-message
template.description: Generate a concise, friendly chatbot welcome message mentioning the user by name.
